profile_summary:

Proficient in leveraging cloud services like **GCP** for high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors. Adept in creating testable code and implementing **OpenAPI** standards for seamless integration, while focusing on distributed systems and real-time data processing. My background includes creating efficient machine learning pipelines and deploying models using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, which enhance operational efficiency and deliver intelligent automation solutions.
